}}'''''Minecraft'' Annual 2024''' is a ''Minecraft'' book authored by [[Mojang AB]] and [[Farshore Books]].

== Synopsis ==
{{quote|
Discover all there is to know about the past year of ''Minecraft'' in this exciting annual. Stuffed to the brim with updates, activities, step-by-step builds and tips and tricks for the game, this book is a must-have for any minecrafter!

This year’s annual includes updates such as the new [[Player|skins]], [[Minecraft Legends|Legends]], the [[Trails & Tales|1.20 update]] and [[Minecraft Dungeons|Dungeons]] [[Dungeons:Fauna Faire|Fauna Faire]], as well as a [[desert]] build and survival challenge, a [[Buried Treasure|treasure]] hunt, fun games to play in [[Survival|Survival mode]] and fun new builds to create.|Book description<ref>{{Citation|url=https://www.amazon.co.uk/Minecraft-Annual-2024-Mojang-AB/dp/0008537135/|title=Minecraft Annual 2024: The best new official children’s gaming annual of 2023 – perfect for kids, teens, gamers and Minecraft fans of all ages!|author=Mojang AB|website=Amazon|archive=1}}</ref>}}
